credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Maira Kalman:  Ooh-la-la (Max in Love)
description:
The Paris setting features illustrations that quote humorously from the arts, as in a hunchback perched on Notre Dame Cathedral (Victor Hugo, the author); a Parisian woman wearing a bunch of bananas (Josephine Baker, the actress); and a man's hat marked "this is not a hat" (Joan Miro, the artist). The rhyming text incorporates French words in the English language narrative.
Reference: New York Public Library LEO catalog (nypl.org) - Copyright, 1991 Cahners Business Information, Inc.
name: Book
